en: Please be mindfull handling sensitive data
sw: Please be mindfull handling sensitive data

en: The ***FreesearchR*** app only stores data for analyses, but please only use with sensitive data when running locally. [Read more here](https://agdamsbo.github.io/FreesearchR/#run-locally-on-your-own-machine).
sw: The ***FreesearchR*** app only stores data for analyses, but please only use with sensitive data when running locally. [Read more here](https://agdamsbo.github.io/FreesearchR/#run-locally-on-your-own-machine).

en: Choose your favourite output file format for further work, and download, when the analyses are done.
sw: Choose your favourite output file format for further work, and download, when the analyses are done.

en: The FreesearchR app only stores data for analyses, but please only use with sensitive data when running locally. Read more here
sw: The FreesearchR app only stores data for analyses, but please only use with sensitive data when running locally. Read more here

en: Below, are several options for simple data manipulation like update variables by renaming, creating new labels (for nicer tables in the report) and changing variable classes (numeric, factor/categorical etc.).
sw: Below, are several options for simple data manipulation like update variables by renaming, creating new labels (for nicer tables in the report) and changing variable classes (numeric, factor/categorical etc.).

en: There are more advanced options to modify factor/categorical variables as well as create new factor from a continous variable or new variables with R code. At the bottom you can restore the original data.
sw: There are more advanced options to modify factor/categorical variables as well as create new factor from a continous variable or new variables with R code. At the bottom you can restore the original data.

en: Please note that data modifications are applied before any filtering.
sw: Please note that data modifications are applied before any filtering.

en: Below options allow more advanced varaible manipulations.
sw: Below options allow more advanced varaible manipulations.

en: Reorder the levels of factor/categorical variables.
sw: Reorder the levels of factor/categorical variables.

en: Create factor/categorical variable from a continous variable (number/date/time).
sw: Create factor/categorical variable from a continous variable (number/date/time).

en: Create a new variable based on an R-expression.
sw: Create a new variable based on an R-expression.

en: Raw print of the original vs the modified data.
sw: Raw print of the original vs the modified data.

en: Enter an expression to define new column:
sw: Enter an expression to define new column:

en: Click on a column name to add it to the expression:
sw: Click on a column name to add it to the expression:

en: Choose a name for the column to be created or modified,
sw: Choose a name for the column to be created or modified,

en: then enter an expression before clicking on the button above to validate or on
sw: then enter an expression before clicking on the button above to validate or on

en: New column name cannot be empty
sw: New column name cannot be empty

en: First five rows are shown below:
sw: First five rows are shown below:

en: Upload a file, get data directly from REDCap or use local or sample data.
sw: Upload a file, get data directly from REDCap or use local or sample data.

en: Create a new variable (otherwise replaces the one selected)
sw: Create a new variable (otherwise replaces the one selected)

en: Date to use as origin to convert date/datetime:
sw: Date to use as origin to convert date/datetime:

en: You can choose between these file types:
sw: You can choose between these file types:

en: Rows to skip before reading data:
sw: Rows to skip before reading data:

en: if several use a comma (',') to separate them
sw: if several use a comma (',') to separate them

en: {data_text} has {n} observations and {n_var} variables, with {n_complete} ({p_complete} %) complete cases.
sw: {data_text} has {n} observations and {n_var} variables, with {n_complete} ({p_complete} %) complete cases.

en: At 0, only complete variables are included; at 100, all variables are included.
sw: At 0, only complete variables are included; at 100, all variables are included.

en: The following variable pairs are highly correlated: {sentence_paste(.x,and_str)}.\nConsider excluding one {more}from the dataset to ensure variables are independent.
sw: The following variable pairs are highly correlated: {sentence_paste(.x,and_str)}.\nConsider excluding one {more}from the dataset to ensure variables are independent.

en: No variables have a correlation measure above the threshold.
sw: No variables have a correlation measure above the threshold.

en: Only non-text variables are available for plotting. Go the "Data" to reclass data to plot.
sw: Only non-text variables are available for plotting. Go the "Data" to reclass data to plot.

en: Drawing the plot. Hold tight for a moment..
sw: Drawing the plot. Hold tight for a moment..

en: A classical way of visualising the distribution of an ordinal scale like the modified Ranking Scale and known as Grotta bars
sw: A classical way of visualising the distribution of an ordinal scale like the modified Ranking Scale and known as Grotta bars

en: A modern alternative to the classic boxplot to visualise data distribution
sw: A modern alternative to the classic boxplot to visualise data distribution

en: A way of visualising change between groups
sw: A way of visualising change between groups

en: A classic way of showing the association between to variables
sw: A classic way of showing the association between to variables

en: A classic way to plot data distribution by groups
sw: A classic way to plot data distribution by groups

en: Generate area-proportional Euler diagrams to display set relationships
sw: Generate area-proportional Euler diagrams to display set relationships

en: Data is only stored for analyses and deleted when the app is closed.
sw: Data is only stored for analyses and deleted when the app is closed.

en: Consider [running ***FreesearchR*** locally](https://agdamsbo.github.io/FreesearchR/#run-locally-on-your-own-machine) if working with sensitive data.
sw: Consider [running ***FreesearchR*** locally](https://agdamsbo.github.io/FreesearchR/#run-locally-on-your-own-machine) if working with sensitive data.

en: Data includes {n_pairs} pairs of highly correlated variables.
sw: Data includes {n_pairs} pairs of highly correlated variables.

en: Below you find a summary table for quick insigths, and on the right you can visualise data classes, browse observations and apply different data filters.
sw: Below you find a summary table for quick insigths, and on the right you can visualise data classes, browse observations and apply different data filters.

en: The following error occured on determining correlations:
sw: The following error occured on determining correlations:

en: We encountered the following error creating your report:
sw: We encountered the following error creating your report:

en: Missing vs non-missing observations in the variable **'{variabler()}'**
sw: Missing vs non-missing observations in the variable **'{variabler()}'**

en: There is a significant correlation between {n_nonmcar} variables and missing observations in the outcome variable {outcome}.
sw: There is a significant correlation between {n_nonmcar} variables and missing observations in the outcome variable {outcome}.

en: There is a total of {p_miss} % missing observations.
sw: There is a total of {p_miss} % missing observations.

en: Reset to original imported dataset. Careful! There is no un-doing.
sw: Reset to original imported dataset. Careful! There is no un-doing.

en: Only factor/categorical variables are available for stratification. Go back to the 'Prepare' tab to reclass a variable if it's not on the list.
sw: Only factor/categorical variables are available for stratification. Go back to the 'Prepare' tab to reclass a variable if it's not on the list.

en: To avoid evaluating the correlation of the outcome variable, this can be excluded from the plot or select 'none'.
sw: To avoid evaluating the correlation of the outcome variable, this can be excluded from the plot or select 'none'.

en: Set the cut-off for considered 'highly correlated'.
sw: Set the cut-off for considered 'highly correlated'.

en: To consider if data is missing by random, choose the outcome/dependent variable, if it has any missings to evaluate if there is a significant difference across other variables depending on missing data or not.
sw: To consider if data is missing by random, choose the outcome/dependent variable, if it has any missings to evaluate if there is a significant difference across other variables depending on missing data or not.

en: Sure you want to reset data? This cannot be undone.
sw: Sure you want to reset data? This cannot be undone.

en: This window is aimed at advanced users and require some *R*-experience!
sw: This window is aimed at advanced users and require some *R*-experience!

en: Here is an overview of how your data is interpreted, and where data is missing. Use this information to consider if data is missing at random or if some observations are missing systematically wich may be caused by an observation bias.
sw: Here is an overview of how your data is interpreted, and where data is missing. Use this information to consider if data is missing at random or if some observations are missing systematically wich may be caused by an observation bias.

en: If none are selected, all are included.
sw: If none are selected, all are included.

en: Press 'Analyse' to create the regression model and after changing parameters.
sw: Press 'Analyse' to create the regression model and after changing parameters.

en: The token is a string of 32 numbers and letters.
sw: The token is a string of 32 numbers and letters.

en: Select fields/variables to import and click the funnel to apply optional filters
sw: Select fields/variables to import and click the funnel to apply optional filters

en: Data retrieved, but it looks like only the ID was retrieved from the server. Please check with your REDCap administrator that you have required permissions for data access.
sw: Data retrieved, but it looks like only the ID was retrieved from the server. Please check with your REDCap administrator that you have required permissions for data access.

en: Data retrieved, but it looks like not all requested fields were retrieved from the server. Please check with your REDCap administrator that you have required permissions for data access.
sw: Data retrieved, but it looks like not all requested fields were retrieved from the server. Please check with your REDCap administrator that you have required permissions for data access.

en: Click to see the imported data
sw: Click to see the imported data

sw: Import a dataset from an environment

en: Use a datasat from your environment or from the environment of a package.
sw: Use a datasat from your environment or from the environment of a package.

sw: Use a dataset from your environment or from the environment of a package.
